tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went through root canal treatment and i am satisfied of her  services. She is very calm and conscious of doing painfree dental treatment. thank you very much Dr. Shruti for detailed explanation.  Her charges are quite affordable compared to the treatment quality which she  provides.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am having high teeth sensitivity and hence I had visited Dental Wellness Clinic. I am happy with the service they provided. The dentist gave me some medicines and assured me of guaranteed results. I can feel the results just after 2 days of taking medicines.

tags: None
review:
I had gone there with severe toothache
And i didnt want to extract it i wanted to save it.
She explained to me nicely the procedure for root canal treatment which was needed to save the tooth
The treatment was painless and
I Highly recommend Dr Shruti

tags: None
review: My dad was having dental problem from long long time.I was very much worried about it. As he used to always complain of his tooth pain . I visited Dental Wellness clinic and Doctor treated for my dad with care.Now my dad is much better and having no pain. Thank you Dr Shruti

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I desperately needed dentures .  There are no words to describe how WONDERFUL my experience with  Dr. Shruti. She Greeted with respect, dignity and a deep desire to provide the best possible care for her patients and their many, diverse needs. Fitting dentures to an individual is quite a daunting challenge to say the least. Patience, persistent and perseverance is what it takes with each individual and Dr. Shruti and her staff come through with flying colors! My gratitude for Dr. Shruti and her staff goes beyond the stars! There is no other dentist I would go to or recommend! When you find the best, you keep it!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Dr. Shruti for my daughters smile design. She was best at her work and i am fully satisfied. Her best part is her behavior and the care she has shown for her patient.
Recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Was looking for my daughters teeth shaping. I went to Dr. Shruti and she was so well behaved and guided so well. She has done a marvelous job. I recommend to visit her regarding any dental issues. Quality treatment.

review: Very good and up to the mark treatment, Doctor is very gentle understands the patient's problem very well and gives quick n good remedies, perfect execution of work, well experienced. Highly recommended

tags: None
review: Dr Shruti is able and competent doctor who treats his patient with utmost care and sincerity.I have done front tooth filling and repair with him, few years back and fully satisfied till date .

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ******* * **** **** **** *** Dr Shruti is both a great dentist and a good human being. Having experience hand . Would recommend to anyone who needs to fix their dental issues.

tags: None
review: Reasonably priced and no extra charge for smiles! The right place to go if you are seeking genuine opinion on your oral health. The doctor takes adequate time to understand the issues and discusses the treatment in detail. Thank you Dr. Shruti.

tags: None
review: Dr Shruti is very transparent and at the core always wishes the best treatment and outcomes for her patients. Highly recommended.

tags: None
review: I had undergone dental treatment under Dr.Shruti Suman and I have no words to express my level of satisfaction...Amazing doctor and great service and above all she think about pain and comfort of the patient...Will be always thankful to Dr.Shruti

tags: None
review: I highly recommend this place to get your oral health fixed! Doctors are very co-operative and efficient. I have taken up treatments which I had postponed for a long time. Thank You Dr. Shruti

tags: None
